title: no swag bag at hoyts finals
body: went to hoytes finaly and got no swag bag, no one else seemed to have one. did i miss anything?

replies.body: Yea same thing happened to me at Auckland and I missed out on the swagbags despite paying 5 dollars more for it. I didn't mind because the finals were great anyways and it was good to watch with other people. Some people could have taken more than one because the bags were already out on the seats. Also there was a price difference for tickets with swag bags and those without so you should check which one you had.
Ah that's maybe why. I did pay extra for my ticket and someone must have taken it :(. Probably {{champion:17}}
I got to the game late, at midnight ish, and my showbag was still there XD{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
If the bags were on the seat with no one to administer them then someone definitely took more then one
Do you mean you went to the Worlds final viewing at Hoyts or you went at another time?
was at Auckland hoyts finals live stayed to end
The Worlds final viewing at Hoyts (Sylvia Park)

I went to the Worlds Final viewing at Hoyts Sylvia Park and didnt get a "swag bag" but wasn't too annoyed since the Worlds Final was well worth it {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

...But maybe a little bit sad I didn't get a free skin {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Just here to read the comments {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
